function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of knowledge on airborne virus transmissions in built environments","Impact":"Increased spread of airborne viruses in built environments","Mitigation":"Education and training on virus transmissions and effectiveness of ventilation systems","Technologies":"CFD models, performance-based modeling, digital simulation and analysis tools","People":"Architects, mechanical engineers","Owner":"Educational institutions, industry organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate integration of disinfection and purification techniques in building design","Impact":"Ineffective control of COVID-19 transmission in built environments","Mitigation":"Integration of effective disinfection and purification techniques, advanced tools and preparations","Technologies":"Disinfection and purification technologies","People":"Architects, engineers, facility managers","Owner":"Architectural firms, engineering firms, facility management companies"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness and education on indoor air quality (IAQ) in architectural design","Impact":"Poor IAQ leading to increased spread of viruses and health risks","Mitigation":"Increased awareness and education on the importance of IAQ, use of advanced tools for IAQ optimization","Technologies":"IAQ modeling and simulation tools","People":"Architects, engineers, building occupants","Owner":"Educational institutions, industry organizations"}]}
